review.title: “Fast paced, competitive, and sometimes unethical”
review.pros: Pros – Plenty of ways to make money aside from base salary. Also, solid corporate IT infrastructure.
review.cons: Cons – If you aren't ready to give 110% every day, you won't meet sales quotas. If you don't meet quotas, they'll help you find the door.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Take better care of your front line employees and managers - this attitude will be paid forward to your customers.
